Name: Gangsta Hero
About the game: notice What you are buying is not the complete finished product of the game, because the visual novel game will be made in a way of continuous update, your purchase will be the biggest support to the author, thank you very much! intro When you graduate you suddenly realized there is a mystery that you broke up with your girlfriend you went to a foreign country alone to seek the truth Sloth city is a city ruled by evil forces, You' re in the middle of a mafia struggle You will meet all kinds of people You can become romeo or remains unspotted from the world, depending on your choice. In an accident, you acquired the ability to change genes Becoming an angel or a demon is just depend on your thoughts Would you be a hero, change this situation or be a villain and enjoy it?
